prompts.text: A smiling young woman with long brown hair, wearing a red t-shirt, standing against a plain white wall.
An elderly man with glasses and a grey mustache, sitting in a simple wooden chair, with a solid blue background.
A teenage boy with short black hair and freckles, wearing a green hoodie, looking directly at the camera with a neutral expression.
A middle-aged woman with curly red hair, laughing and wearing a yellow sundress, standing in front of a beige curtain.
A serious-looking man in his 30s with a beard, wearing a white dress shirt, against a light grey background.
A young girl with pigtails and a missing front tooth, smiling and wearing a purple t-shirt, in front of a pastel pink wall.
An athletic woman in her 20s with short blonde hair, wearing a blue sports top, against a plain off-white background.
A balding middle-aged man with glasses, wearing a brown sweater, looking thoughtful against a cream-colored wall.
A senior woman with silver hair in a bun, wearing a floral blouse, sitting on a simple chair with a light green background.
A young man with dreadlocks, wearing a black t-shirt, looking to the side with a neutral expression, against a plain white backdrop.
